mapper.insert: insert into pay(pay_num, prd_num, buyer, price, reg_date, payment, state) values(pay_seq.nextval, #{prdnum}, #{buyer}, (select price from products where products_num = #{prdnum}) , sysdate, 'kakaopay', 0)
mapper.select: select * from pay where prd_num = #{prdnum} and state = 0
select pay_num, prd_num, buyer, name as prdname, A.price, A.reg_date, aprv_date, A.state from pay A inner join products B on A.prd_num = B.products_num where buyer = #{loginId} order by reg_date desc
select pay_num, prd_num, buyer, name as prdname, A.price, A.reg_date, aprv_date, A.state from pay A inner join products B on A.prd_num = B.products_num where A.state = 0 order by A.reg_date desc

select pay_num, prd_num, buyer, name as prdname, A.price, A.reg_date, aprv_date, A.state, A.payment from pay A inner join products B on A.prd_num = B.products_num where A.state = 1 order by A.reg_date desc

select pay_num, prd_num, buyer, name as prdname, A.price, A.reg_date, A.aprv_date, A.state, A.payment from pay A inner join products B on A.prd_num = B.products_num where A.state = 2 or A.state = 3 order by A.aprv_date desc
